channel.title: Jobs on shx
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on shx

item.title: Fullstack Developer
item.description:
Stack:

PHP, Laravel, TypeScript, JavaScript, Vue.js, MySQL, Docker, Linux, Git, CI/CD, Jira, Python, Selenium.

Responsibilities:

  • Developed and maintained fullstack web applications using PHP (Laravel) and JavaScript (Vue.js), ensuring responsive design and optimal performance.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, design solutions, and implement new features that enhanced user experience and met business objectives.

item.title: Backend Developer
item.description:
Stack:

PHP, Magento (Adobe Commerce), Redis, RabbitMQ, Postgres, Docker, Linux, Git, CI/CD, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence.

Responsibilities:

  • Developed and maintained backend systems for e-commerce platforms using PHP and Magento, ensuring high performance and scalability.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features, improving user experience and

item.title: IT Technician
item.description:
Stack:

Joomla, PHP, Python, Linux, HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

Responsibilities:

  • Provided technical support and troubleshooting for hardware and software issues, ensuring minimal downtime for users.
  • Managed and maintained computer systems, including installation, configuration, and updates of software applications.
